[h1] СДЕЛАЛИ БЫ ЕЁ БЕСПЛАТНОЙ [/h1]

 почему же я так бомблю? 
1. Это типичная игра в стиле бесплатных игр, только за неё ты платишь чтобы потом платить опять в ней.
2. Покупая эту игру по сути тебе дают бесплатный набор персонажей (как в бесплатных играх)
3. Хочешь новых персонажей?- плати.
4. Хочешь новых маньяков?- плати.
5. Хочешь новые скины?- плати.
6. Хочешь что-то новое?- ахаха, правильно! -плати!
7. Я ничего бы не говорил если покупая игру мы бы получали доступ ко всем персонажам т.к мы бляха платим за целую игру, но вместо игры мы получаем кусок сгнившего огрызка, вместо яблоко (как в других нормальных платных играх)
8.  А что мы получаем в бесплатных играх? Правильно! тот же огрызок за который надо платить! (казалось бы в чём разница?)
а в том что в бесплатных играх мы платим за то чтобы расширить бесплатную версию, а тут мы покупая игру должны ещё докупать к ней всё! Пиздец.
 9. Не говоря уж о комьюнити игры

[h1] Тимэйты [/h1]
- Тимеры (которые насрать на всех и вся, у них есть только они и только генераторы (которые тебе не помогут если ты на 
                крюке)
- Ген. рашеры (игроки которые видят только генераторы, а другие игроки? не, пусть 
                         сдыхают, и помогать им он не будет.
- Наживки (игроки за которым гонится маньяк, но они идут именно к тебе с ним, тем самым натравляя его на 
                                  тебя)

[h1] Маньяки [/h1]
- Кемперы (посадили тебя на крюк или тимейта, и стоят возле него)
- Имбовые (платные персонажи у которых дохеря и чуть-чуть имбовых перков, которые тебя могут видеть и слышать всю 
                   карту, или просто другие читерные перки)
и если раньше был хоть какой-то баланс игры, то сейчас его вообще нет, с появлением новых платных маньяков, за выжившего фактически невозможно играть, учитывая тот факт что и обновы поднасрали выжившим ставя лимиты на прыжки и т.д  то-есть даже сама игра заставляет тебя покупать чтобы ты мог хоть как-то играть, но всё равно от игры ты не получишь удовольствия, она просто для мазахистов которые любят платить за боль. А платить 4к (со всеми DLC) за это говно? Неееее, спасибо!

이게임은 대채할만한 게임이 없다는게 장점.
유명 공포영화의 살인마들과 숨바꼭질을 할수있다는거에 의미를 둘수있음. 
한섭은 현재 서버가없어서 넘어오는 중국과 동남아.일본. 간혹 러시아쪽 사람이 매칭됨. 
운영진자체가 핵 잡는거에 활동을 거의 안할정도로 무능함. 
유저가 직접 영상따고 메일 보내야 그제서야 처리하는 수준. 그래서 매칭 돌리다보면 
심심찮게 핵쓰는 살인마나 생존자들을 볼수있음. 
혼자하면 쉽게 질리겠지만서도. 만약 아는 지인이 5명정도 된다면 친선전을 해서 
따로 놀수있음. [대신 블포는 못 얻음]
대거 넘어오는 중국사람들땜에 
살인마 풀도 좀 늘어서 그런지 매칭은 그리 심하게 걸리진 않음. 
꼭 이게임을 즐기고 싶다면. 세일기간때 사서 즐기는걸 추천드림. 새로운 생존자나 살인마를 DLC로 파는 형식이니 돈나가는거 싫으면 기존 생존자.살인마로도 충분히 즐길수있습니다.

Das spiel war als es Raus gekommen ist Wunderbar und danach auch noch mit regelmäßigen updates und Erweiterung. Aber dann kam der Tag an dem es auch für Console verfügbar war und Crossplay hatte was an sich kein Problem war, dies war aber mit einigen Updates verbunden die das Spiel verändert haben. Und für mich nun das spiel schlecht macht da es mehr und mehr für Konsole Optimiert wird und es gibt immer mehr kostenpflichtige DLCs wo man nur Character bekommt und die meisten kann man sich garnicht mehr im Spiel sich verdienen entweder man kauft das dlc, ingamewährung oder Battlepass. Was mich an dem spiel mitlerweile auch stört. Es war so ein schönes spiel und Erinnerungen die ich gesammelt habe, es macht mich teilweise schon Traurig das ich es leider nicht mehr spielen kann, da es kein Spaß mehr macht durch die Veränderungen die es hatte.

(18.7.21):
Kleiner Nachtrag, mittlerweile ist das spiel hauptsächlich Konsolen optimiert was mich als PC Spieler sehr stört und auch das Game an sich verändert hat, seit ich es zu letzt gespielt habe die Mechanik von Charakter und die Designs von den Maps hat sich nun so weit verändert damit die Konsolen Spieler was sehen können und nicht so düster mehr. Das Feeling vom Game wie es mal war ist es nicht mehr, ja es hat großen Erfolg was dem auch vergönnt sei aber ich erinnere mich an ein spiel mit einer Düsteren Atmosphäre, dunkel Design, grusel vom Killer und nu ist alles bunt und farbenfroh hell

This game WAS really fun. Grinding to get all the meta perks was fun and juicing all the killers was amazing. I met tons of great people on there but the queue times are just terrible and it is really demotivating to play the game anymore. I loved this game so much and I recommend it to people who love messing with people on survivor. If you want to have fun and play a lot, play in the mornings because you will get a game a lot faster than at night. NEVER and I mean NEVER play at night. You will wait for a game for 15 mins and you have a chance of dying in the first 10 mins of the game. This is what made me stop playing the game, but overall this game is amazing but there's just better games out there.

I have close to 1,000 hours, played far before the clown update, seen what the game has gone through. I can't recommend it. This game looks like it would be great on paper. However, the devs don't care about this game at all. For instance, even before the clown update (which mind you was in 2018) people were complaining about how awful the hit boxes were. That's over 3 years of almost everyone complaining about this ONE thing. They finally fixed it here 2021, over 3 years later, but before that made if worse. Another problem is the game play. It's entirely possible to die before you get a chance to do anything, if the killer simply hooks you swiftly, stays near the hook for a while which will make it extremely hard to get saved, and then if you DO manage to get saved, the killer can simply hit you down straight away without you being able to do much. And yes I'm aware that borrowed time and dead hard exists, but dead hard is a buggy useless mess, and borrowed time will work yes, but if the killer wants to they can ignore everyone else and JUST go for you. This plays out pretty much every. single. game. Why? Well, me and my friend did a little experiment and as it turns out, it's an entirely viable strategy. There IS a penalty for standing near a hook for too long, but this basically doesn't exist. You will excel if you just camp and tunnel the whole game. Now on the flip side, if you actually want to play the game in a fun way (which kinda just doesn't exist) the survivors can play in a way to where you can basically never catch them, and they can point at you and tbag and flashlight all they want. This whole time as well, generators are getting done. So when you finally catch them, your pretty angry at them and you want them dead. But the other survivors? They want them to live. And will throw EVERYTHING they can at you to save their friend, who you want dead. So, to prevent them from escaping, what do you do? You camp the hook and keep anyone from touching the hook. It all loops back around. And yes, you can just stop chasing that one person and apply pressure elsewhere right? Kind of, and that will usually work. But a lot of times you end up just letting that one person keep going and going which allows them to effectively do whatever they want. All in all, this game is an awful mess, other than the graphics and music. Constant updates nobody asked for while long running issues people want fixed are left untouched and/or are made worse, and the game play is just a loop and of anger and misery. I simply cannot recommend this game. Everything I covered is just the surface of this games problems.

Even if this game were free, it would still be too expensive.  Possibly the worst game I've ever played.  It's a shame, because it has so much potential were it in the hands of a competent dev team/company able to view it from more than just a business perspective.  The current team has shown that they clearly don't care about the state of the game.

Update 1 year later: Game's still dogshit.  Devs don't know their own game and rely on statistics for game balancing.  They also took 6 years to release their first major game balancing update.  Excited to see how they learn from their mistakes in the next game balancing update.  Only 6 more years until that releases.
This game is amazing with friends and to play alone, highly recommend getting it.

After 1000 hours playing I'd not recommend this game for the following reasons:
- always bugged, bugs takes too long to be fixed, affects gameplay considerably
- the terror feeling and ambiance does not last, everything becomes about mechanics
- survivor gameplay is made of holding m1 and QTE with space, survivors only have to learn what the new killer does but in the end is all about kiting
- gameplay mechanic is broken which the developer tries to fix with new perks, and without it you can do tunneling as a killer with no penalties, or be tunneled as survivor anytime
- no balance at all, the killer should be the bully, the oppressor, in the end the killer is the one bullied.
